channel.title: Gordon Elliott on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Canceled: The Paula Deen Story’ Review: Disgraced TV Chef Offers a Full Serving of Excuses in New Doc
item.description: Billy Corben’s TIFF-premiering documentary explores the rise and fall of the butter-loving Southern chef, revisiting her N-word scandal 12 years later.
